name: Validate emails from Google Forms Submissions using MailboxValidator and adding them to a Google Sheet
description: Every time a new Google Forms response is submitted, Make will automatically validate the email address in that form response using MailboxValidator. If the email is not disposable, it will add a row with the data from that form to a Google Sheet. This example uses the sheet in [this link](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1I_0ORbuaKUyehO5qj7l3iWRNYELfAuG5lQzLfyuSw9A/edit#gid=0).
